channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dangerous wooden plank broken on children’s climbing frame - not sectioned since being reported in August., 20th September
item.description:
Broken plank on children’s playground - it was reported in August by someone else but not actioned and has got worse. Very dangerous and could cause a serious accident.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Martens Avenue, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Japanese knot weed, 20th September
item.description:
Walking on cassland road this week I noticed in the front garden of 84 knotweed growing there. 1a maynall road/cassland road the knotweed was showing seedlings. Yesterday I noticed 84 still growing but 1a been cut back but had growth thro the wall see pic.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brookfield Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Damaged edges so won’t for back

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Woodland Hill, London

item.title: Council Vegatation/Trees damaging 33 Anerley Hill, London SE19 2BA, 20th September
item.description:
Trees and vegetation from small park area damaged fencing, roof of garage and entering roof of garage of 33 Anerley Hill, SE19 2BA. The propery is right next and borders the small park area in question. This vegetation has caused damage and continues to damage property. It needs to be pruned, cut down to root level and treated to inhibit further growth. A large tree branch has already fallen at the back of house. Please go as soon as possible and you can see the scale of the uncontrolled vegetation, ongoing for many month. On a previous subsidence claim it was concluded that Bromley Trees would manage this areas by cutting the vegetation to root level and treat the roots to inhibit futher growth. Please contact me directly if need be but the vegetation is out of control.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Anerley Hill, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Residents dumping rubbish at shopfront Catherine Street, 20th September
item.description:
Open bags of rubbish at side of SugarSin store premises, obstructing access to store awnings, with waste often falling into the street. Open bags often containing food waste, sanitary items & cardboard boxes
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Catherine Street, Holborn, London

item.title: Broken fence, 20th September
item.description:
There is a broken fence at the car park of Abbey Lane and Littlestone Close by the homes 36-34 Littlestone Close. It was crashed into by a drug driver and only the wooden posts were collected. The steel rod was left by the councils contractor and not repaired. It is a massive safety risk. It needs to be repaired.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abbey Lane, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street left unswept, 20th September
item.description:
Good afternoon, Our street has not been swept in some time and litter has been accumulating as a result. Can you please send someone at your earliest convenience? Thanks, Matteo

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pemberton Place, Hackney, London

item.description:

item.title: Excessive and intrusive smoke and ash, 20th September
item.description:
This commercial premises has refused to make any compromises to stop smoke filling the area and fillin local flats. We have asked for a resolution that suits all and nothing has been done. the bbq triggers asthma, and has caused damage to our property

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Shepherds Lane, Hackney, London

item.title: Rubbish left outside 17 Celandine Drive SE28 8EP, 20th September
item.description:
Someone has cleared out a property and dumped household rubbish is a green waste only bin. Also a black and yellow bag full of items left on pavement beside the bin outside 17 Celandine Drive SE28 8EP. Also a bed mattress dumped outside 6 Celandine Drive SE28 8EP.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Celandine Drive, Thamesmead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road surface in full of holes and ridges, 20th September
item.description:
The road surface outside the bus stop Bryan Road/Surrey Docks Farm towards Victoria is in a very poor state of repair. There are potholes, dips and ridges and it's a patchwork of different materials.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rotherhithe Street, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet
